title: Effects of a diabetes education program integrated with text-message support for lifestyle change among older individuals with type 2 diabetes in communities: a randomised controlled trial
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 235

Author(s): M. Hou, W.N. Qiu, H.L. Qi, H.X. Shao, J.M. Yu, H.Y. Bian
